items: Launch Nightjar. You'll see the onboarding screen.
Choose "Create New Identity" and set a display name.
Set a 6-digit PIN to protect your identity.
Save your 12-word recovery phrase â€” you'll need it if you forget your PIN or move to a new device.
You're in! Create a workspace to get started.
Enter your 6-digit PIN on the lock screen.
If you have multiple identities, select the one you want from the identity list.
After 10 incorrect PIN attempts within one hour, your identity is permanently deleted for security.

content.text: Your 12-word recovery phrase is the only way to restore your identity. Write it down and keep it safe. You can view it again later from your profile (ğŸ” View Recovery Phrase).

Web mode warning: In web mode, all your data is stored in your browser's local storage. If you clear your browser data (cache, site data, or cookies) and no other peers currently have a copy of your workspaces, your data will be permanently lost. Use the desktop app for more durable storage, or ensure at least one other peer has synced your workspaces before clearing browser data.
